info.title: ROS OCP Backend API
info.description: GO Echo API for Resource Optimization OCP Backend Service

get.description: This feature is in limited preview for select customers. Refer to [this link](https://github.com/RedHatInsights/ros-ocp-backend/blob/main/openapi.json) if you want checkout the OpenAPI spec file.

externalDocs.description: Please refer to this blog post if you want to be included in the preview

parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
Used as a fallback when the 'Accept' header is missing or specifies an unsupported media type.  
Maximum number of records is 1000 i.e. 6000 rows for CSV downloads.  
The 'offset' parameter can be used for pagination with both formats.

parameters.name: workload_type
parameters.description: Options are daemonset, deployment, deploymentconfig, replicaset, replicationcontroller, statefulset

parameters.name: true-units
parameters.description: Shows all values in true/real-world units. Accepts 1, t, T, TRUE, true, True, 0, f, F, FALSE, false, False.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Options are cluster, project, workload_type, workload, container, last_reported

schema.example: User is not authorized to access the resource

get.description: Get resource optimization recommendations at the namespace level. This feature is in limited preview for select customers.

parameters.name: true-units
parameters.description: Shows all values in true/real-world units. Accepts 1, t, T, TRUE, true, True, 0, f, F, FALSE, false, False.

406.description: Requested response format is not supported

message.example: CSV format is not supported. Please use application/json.

503.description: namespace Feature temporarily disabled / rollout pending

message.example: This API is not yet enabled. Please try again later.
Workload is optimised wrt CPU REQUESTS, no changes needed
Workload is optimised wrt CPU LIMITS, no changes needed
Workload is optimised wrt MEMORY REQUESTS, no changes needed
Workload is optimised wrt MEMORY LIMITS, no changes needed
